scenes.background: Bob frowns, while Monica looks thoughtful.
scenes.description: Maybe. But was it really the best move to step in without consulting more?

options.text: I thought it was an urgent situation that needed immediate action.
options.analysis: You justify your proactive approach, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy could be stronger.

options.text: Possibly, but sometimes you need to make quick decisions for the greater good.
options.analysis: You defend the need for quick decisions, showing good self-regulation, but both perception and empathy could be improved.

options.text: You might be right, Bob. We could have discussed it more.
options.analysis: You acknowledge Bob's perspective, showing empathy but lower in perception and motivation.
